00028   class Guard {
00029   public:
00030     Guard(const char* label)
00031     : m_label(label) {
00032       Write("+");
00033       Log::IncrementIndent();
00034     }
00035 
00036     ~Guard() {
00037       Log::DecrementIndent();
00038       Write("-");
00039     }
00040 
00041     void Write(const char* prefix) {
00042       Log::Write((prefix + m_label).c_str());
00043     }
00044 
00045   private:
00046     std::string m_label;
00047   };
